charges.charge_description: Felony Information 2/12/07: 21:846 Conspiracy to distribute and to possess with intent to distribute cocaine(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Plea of guilty to Counts 1-3. Imprisonment for 84 months as to each count, to run concurrently. Remanded to custody. Five years supervised release as to Counts 1-2 and three years as to Count 3, to all run concurrently, with special conditions. $300 special assessment.

charges.charge_description: Felony Information 2/12/07: 21:841(a)(1)  Possession with intent to distribute crack cocaine(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Plea of guilty to Counts 1-3. Imprisonment for 84 months as to each count, to run concurrently. Remanded to custody. Five years supervised release as to Counts 1-2 and three years as to Count 3, to all run concurrently, with special conditions. $300 special assessment.
